page.title: 18Shopkeepers
page.content: Most of the shopkeepers in this area feel that the supermarket has taken some, but not much, of their trade. Many of them try to encourage local shopping by putting advertising posters in their windows. Almost all shopkeepers are concerned about the saftey of their premises these days. Many of the shops are fitted with burglar alarms and some have security gates at the front. Some shopkeepers live on the premises but most do not. There are not many shopkeepers now who make their goods on the premises, although the baker still often does. Shopkeepers believe that most of their customers like the handiness and personal service of the small local shop.
